page.title: 16Milton Abbey School
page.content: This public boarding school for about 300 boys aged thirtee to eighteen is sett in extensive grounds next to the abbey church. Most of the school is very old. th historic Abbot's Hall is in use as a dining room. the extensive curriculum Maths, enlish Language, Science etc is ably handled by a permanent staff of about thity teachers with extra visiting staff for music and additional subjects. Athletic activities are varied, hockey, rugby, cricket, canoeing and encing are taught. the extensive grounds contain a swimming pool, golf course, tnnis courts, and all weather pitch, also a small bore indoor shooting range. A newly built thatre is another outstanding feature, toether with an Army corps ; and Natural History club are part of school life. The head Master and staff
